trans-unit.source: Address type "S" or "K" is not found.
trans-unit.note: Codeunit PTE DC SwissQR Decode - NamedType AddressTypeNotFoundLbl

trans-unit.source: Blanked reference number is expected for reference type NON.
trans-unit.target: Geleerte Referenznummer wird erwartet für Referenzart NON.
trans-unit.note: Codeunit PTE DC SwissQR Decode - NamedType BlankedReferenceExpectedLbl

trans-unit.source: Only CH and LI IBAN values are permitted.
trans-unit.target: Nur CH- und LI-IBAN-Werte sind zulässig.
trans-unit.note: Codeunit PTE DC SwissQR Decode - NamedType CreditorIBANCountryLbl

trans-unit.source: Creditor's account value (IBAN or QR-IBAN) should be 21 chars length.
trans-unit.target: Kontowert (IBAN oder QR-IBAN) des Kreditors muss 21 Zeichen lang sein.
trans-unit.note: Codeunit PTE DC SwissQR Decode - NamedType CreditorIBANLengthLbl

trans-unit.source: Creditor's account value (IBAN or QR-IBAN) is not found.
trans-unit.target: Kontowert (IBAN oder QR-IBAN) des Kreditors nicht gefunden.
trans-unit.note: Codeunit PTE DC SwissQR Decode - NamedType CreditorIBANNotFoundLbl

trans-unit.source: Creditor-Reference must be up to 25 chars length and start with RF and two check digits.
trans-unit.target: Kreditor-Referenz muss bis zu 25 Zeichen lang sein und mit RF und zwei Prüfziffern beginnen.
trans-unit.note: Codeunit PTE DC SwissQR Decode - NamedType CreditorReferenceLengthLbl

trans-unit.source: Currency is not found.
trans-unit.note: Codeunit PTE DC SwissQR Decode - NamedType CurrencyNotFoundLbl

trans-unit.source: The file is empty.
trans-unit.note: Codeunit PTE DC SwissQR Decode - NamedType EmptyFileLbl

trans-unit.source: The line value is expected to be blanked.
trans-unit.note: Codeunit PTE DC SwissQR Decode - NamedType ExpectedBlankedValueLbl

trans-unit.source: Unexpected end of file.
trans-unit.note: Codeunit PTE DC SwissQR Decode - NamedType ExpectedEOFLbl

trans-unit.source: File line %1: %2
trans-unit.note: %1 - line number, %2 - line text message
Codeunit PTE DC SwissQR Decode - NamedType FileLineLbl

trans-unit.source: Header coding type value 1 is not found.
trans-unit.note: Codeunit PTE DC SwissQR Decode - NamedType HeaderCodingTypeNotFoundLbl

trans-unit.source: Header QR type value SPC is not found.
trans-unit.target: Wert SPC für Kopf-QR-Typ nicht gefunden.
trans-unit.note: Codeunit PTE DC SwissQR Decode - NamedType HeaderSPCValueNotFoundLbl

trans-unit.source: Header version value 0200 is not found.
trans-unit.note: Codeunit PTE DC SwissQR Decode - NamedType HeaderVersionValueNotFoundLbl

trans-unit.source: The Name value is not found.
trans-unit.note: Codeunit PTE DC SwissQR Decode - NamedType NameNotFoundLbl

trans-unit.source: Failed to parse amount value.
trans-unit.note: Codeunit PTE DC SwissQR Decode - NamedType ParseAmountFailedLbl

trans-unit.source: Payment reference type is not found.
trans-unit.note: Codeunit PTE DC SwissQR Decode - NamedType PmtReferenceTypeNotFoundLbl

trans-unit.source: QR-Reference must be 27 chars length.
trans-unit.note: Codeunit PTE DC SwissQR Decode - NamedType QRReferenceLengthLbl

trans-unit.source: Trailer value EPD is not found.
trans-unit.note: Codeunit PTE DC SwissQR Decode - NamedType TrailerEPDNotFoundLbl

trans-unit.source: Payment reference type (QRR, SCOR or NON) is not found.
trans-unit.target: Zahlungsreferenztyp (QRR, SCOR oder NON) nicht gefunden.
trans-unit.note: Codeunit PTE DC SwissQR Decode - NamedType UnknownPmtReferenceTypeLbl

trans-unit.source: Unstructured message is not found.
trans-unit.note: Codeunit PTE DC SwissQR Decode - NamedType UnstrMsgNotFoundLbl

trans-unit.source: Only CHF and EUR currencies are permitted.
trans-unit.target: Nur die Währungen CHF und EUR sind erlaubt.
trans-unit.note: Codeunit PTE DC SwissQR Decode - NamedType WrongCurrencyLbl

trans-unit.source: Registration was canceled! Please setup the QR-IBAN bank account for this vendor first.
trans-unit.target: Die Registrierung wurde abgebrochen! Bitte richten Sie zunächst für diesen Lieferanten ein Bankkonto für die QR IBAN ein
trans-unit.note: Codeunit PTE DC SwissQR Mgt. - NamedType ImportCancelledMsg

trans-unit.source: A vendor bank account with IBAN or QR-IBAN\%1\was not found.\\Do you want to create a new vendor bank account?
trans-unit.target: Ein Kreditorenbankkonto mit IBAN oder QR-IBAN\%1\wurde nicht gefunden.\\Möchten Sie ein neues Kreditorenbankkonto erstellen?
trans-unit.note: %1 - IBAN value
Codeunit PTE DC SwissQR Mgt. - NamedType PurchDocVendBankAccountQst

trans-unit.source: QR Bill IBAN: %1
trans-unit.note: Codeunit PTE DC SwissQR Mgt. - Method IdentifyVendorFromQRCode - NamedType QRIdentificationTxt

trans-unit.source: QR Amount incl. VAT
trans-unit.note: Codeunit PTE DC SwissQR Mgt. - Method InsertQRAmtFieldToMasterTemplates - NamedType QRAmtInclFieldName

trans-unit.source: The value of %1 (%2) is not equal to %3 (%4). Make sure that both values match.
trans-unit.target: Der Wert von %1 (%2) ist nicht gleich %3 (%4). Stellen Sie sicher, dass beide Werte übereinstimmen.
trans-unit.note: Codeunit PTE DC SwissQR Mgt. - Method ValidateAmountsInclVat - NamedType QRAmountDoNotMatchComment
